title: Ferrari 'scrapyard' F1 livery and other one-off designs for 2025 Miami GP
summary: There will be some eye-opening special edition F1 car liveries at the Miami Grand Prix this weekend. Here's a look at the one-off paint schemes that have been announced

qa_pairs.question: What is a special edition livery in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A unique paint scheme used on a car for a specific race or event.
wrong_options: A standard paint scheme used throughout the season.
A livery designed for testing purposes only.
A livery that features only sponsor logos.

qa_pairs.question: Which Grand Prix is known for featuring unique one-off liveries in 2025?
Why might teams choose to create one-off liveries for specific races?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To celebrate a special occasion or to attract attention and engage fans.
wrong_options: To experiment with new aerodynamic designs.
